title: Comparing Coping Strategies of Volleyball Players

content.prompt: Sammi and Trina are both on the volleyball team. After a loss, Sammi shows up early to the next practice and works extra hard, whereas Trina skips that practice to go to the movies. Based on these observations, Sammi and Trina most likely differ in which of the following concepts?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
